name: Bunny's Lewd Promises
outcome: Vanesa leans in close to [TargetName], her crimson eyes gleaming with mischief as she whispers seductive promises and lewd suggestions. Her voice drips with honey as she describes all the wonderful things she could do to [TargetHimOrHer], each word carefully chosen to stoke [TargetHisOrHer] desires and cloud [TargetHisOrHer] judgment.
miss: Vanesa attempts to seduce [TargetName] with her lewd promises and suggestions, but [TargetName] manages to resist her honeyed words and maintains [TargetHisOrHer] mental clarity despite her tempting offers.
statusOutcome: [TargetName] becomes completely charmed by Vanesa's seductive promises and lewd suggestions, falling under the spell of her honeyed words and losing [TargetHisOrHer] ability to resist her advances.
